post_title: Anyone have a Piedmont Factory 42 Lajoie or Joss?
post_content:
Hey all,
Looking for a P42 Lajoie or maybe a Joss. I might be able to buy or trade some fun stuff. Let me know if anyone would be willing to part with either. I’m not super picky on condition, just trying not to have it be a beater.

Drop me line on the PM.

Thanks, as always,
Bob
